title: The Emporium of Fear: A Halloween Horror Anthology
description: On the night when the dead walk the earth and the spirits rise, are you brave enough to step inside The Emporium of Fear?Will The Secrets We Keep lead to Delirium or will Unhinged Thoughts be witnessed Through Glass by the unfortunate that dare? Listen as The Organist plays the sorrowful tune of the Bewitched and do your best not to run from Golah. When demons give chase and The Salvation of Kora is at hand, is it possible to set aside Prurience in favor of The Sacrifice? Behind Stained Glass, Strange People await the willing who enter for one final night of fear. The Emporium of Fear: A Halloween Horror Anthology for UNICEF
author: Emery LeeAnn
